verses.text: The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*. As \w whirlwinds|strong="H5492"\w* in the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w pass|strong="H2498"\w* through; \add so\add* it \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, from a \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

A \w grievous|strong="H7186"\w* \w vision|strong="H2380"\w* is \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* unto me; the treacherous \w dealer|strong="H0898"\w* dealeth \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w*, and the \w spoiler|strong="H7703"\w* \w spoileth|strong="H7703"\w*. Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, O \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*: \w besiege|strong="H6696"\w*, O \w Media|strong="H4074"\w*; all the \w sighing|strong="H0585"\w* thereof have I made to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*.\f + \fr 21.2 \ft grievous: Heb. hard\f*

Therefore are my \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w pain|strong="H2479"\w*: \w pangs|strong="H6735"\w* have taken \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* upon me, as the \w pangs|strong="H6735"\w* of a woman that \w travaileth|strong="H3205"\w*: I was bowed \w down|strong="H5753"\w* at the \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \add of it;\add* I was \w dismayed|strong="H0926"\w* at the \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \add of it\add*.

My \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w panted|strong="H8582"\w*, \w fearfulness|strong="H6427"\w* \w affrighted|strong="H1204"\w* me: the \w night|strong="H5399"\w* of my \w pleasure|strong="H2837"\w* hath he \w turned|strong="H7760"\w* into \w fear|strong="H2731"\w* unto me.\f + \fr 21.4 \ft heart…: or, mind wandered\f*\f + \fr 21.4 \ft turned: Heb. put\f*

\w Prepare|strong="H6186"\w* the \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \w watch|strong="H6822"\w* in the \w watchtower|strong="H6844"\w*, \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*: \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, ye \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \add and\add* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* the \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*.

For thus hath the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w set|strong="H5975"\w* a \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w*, let him \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* what he \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w*.

And he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* a \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \add with\add* a \w couple|strong="H6776"\w* of \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, a \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* of \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, \add and\add* a \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* of \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*; and he \w hearkened|strong="H7181"\w* \w diligently|strong="H7182"\w* with \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w heed|strong="H7182"\w*:

And he \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*, A \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*: My \w lord|strong="H0136"\w*, I \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* upon the \w watchtower|strong="H4707"\w* in the \w daytime|strong="H3119"\w*, and I am \w set|strong="H5324"\w* in my \w ward|strong="H4931"\w* whole \w nights|strong="H3915"\w*:\f + \fr 21.8 \ft he…: or, cried as a lion\f*\f + \fr 21.8 \ft whole…: or, every night\f*

And, behold, here \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* a \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* of \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \add with\add* a \w couple|strong="H6776"\w* of \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*. And he \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*, is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*; and all the graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w* of her \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* he hath \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* unto the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

O my \w threshing|strong="H4098"\w*, and the \w corn|strong="H1121"\w* of my \w floor|strong="H1637"\w*: that which I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, have I \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* unto you.\f + \fr 21.10 \ft corn: Heb. son\f*

¶ The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of \w Dumah|strong="H1746"\w*. He \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* to me out of \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, \w Watchman|strong="H8104"\w*, what of the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*? \w Watchman|strong="H8104"\w*, what of the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*?

The \w watchman|strong="H8104"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0857"\w*, and also the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: if ye will \w enquire|strong="H1158"\w*, \w enquire|strong="H1158"\w* ye: \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w come|strong="H0857"\w*.

¶ The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* upon \w Arabia|strong="H6152"\w*. In the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* in \w Arabia|strong="H6152"\w* shall ye \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w*, O ye travelling \w companies|strong="H0736"\w* of \w Dedanim|strong="H1720"\w*.

The \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Tema|strong="H8485"\w* \w brought|strong="H0857"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* to \w him|strong="H7125"\w* that was \w thirsty|strong="H6771"\w*, they \w prevented|strong="H6923"\w* with their \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* him that \w fled|strong="H5074"\w*.\f + \fr 21.14 \ft brought: or, bring ye\f*

For they \w fled|strong="H5074"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w swords|strong="H2719"\w*, \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w drawn|strong="H5203"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w bent|strong="H1869"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, and \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w grievousness|strong="H3514"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 21.15 \ft from the swords: or, for fear, etc: Heb. from the face, etc\f*

For thus hath the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Within a \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, according to the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of an \w hireling|strong="H7916"\w*, and all the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w* shall \w fail|strong="H3615"\w*:

And the \w residue|strong="H7605"\w* of the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of \w archers|strong="H7198"\w*, the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w*, shall be \w diminished|strong="H4591"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 21.17 \ft archers: Heb. bows\f*
